aboutSection.title: About Al-Qamar Plastic Mats & Export Factory
aboutSection.description: A vision that brightens floors and quality that crosses borders. At Al-Qamar Factory for Plastic Mats & Export, we don’t see mats as simple floor covers—we see them as an extension of durability and practical elegance in daily life and global trade. We are a fully integrated Egyptian industrial entity built on a clear vision.
